parameter.name: protocol
parameter.description: The protocol to use to connect to the MQTT broker.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The host where the MQTT broker runs.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port where the MQTT broker listens.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: The username to use to connect to the MQTT broker.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password to use to connect to the MQTT broker.
